111.content: All right. How does she gain?
111.title: Penny Proud

choices: Penny gets chubbier after the breakfast
1111.content:
It was a nice morning and Penny woke up excited and was ready for breakfast.

"Honey!" her mother called. "Breakfast is ready!"

"Coming, mom!" Penny answered

Penny went down to the dinner table and saw a whole plate of waffles, pancakes, cakes and chocolates.

"Wow, mom! You are really making a breakfast in a whole plate." "Thanks mom!" Penny said

"Well, Pennysugar" Trudy said." A mother like me doesn't let her daughter down.

"What am i waiting for?" Penny said "Let's dig in!"

Her mother Trudy looked how Penny was enjoying her meals. But Trudy had a clever plan and thought in her mind. ("My little sugar seems to enjoy my meals." I think Penny needs to put some meat on those bones." I know what to do! I can feed her so she can look more cuter." "But i have to keep it a secret, cause i don't want Penny to know that i am actually fattening her. "Penny won't notice that she is getting fat." But she will notice those tasty meals i usually make for her.)

What happens next do you think?
1111.title: Her mom is feeding her but Penny doesn't kn...

choices: She was overweight and full but still did not notice her weight
She was overweight but were a little more hungry
11112.content:
After that Penny was done with the breakfast she went to her room. When she looked at herself in the mirror she hardly noticed that she got really chubbier.

She thought to herself "Huh?" "Is it just me or did i put on some weight?" Penny asked.

But then she said. "Nah, it's just me."

Penny thought that her weight was fine, even if she got fatter after the meals.

After a few hours, Penny was walking downstairs to check if one of her family members were home. Oddly enough, no one else but her mother Trudy was home. Penny saw that her mother has cooked food on the table. This time it was cheeseburgers, french fries, hot dogs and pizza. Trudy is obviously letting Penny get bigger and bigger but for sone reason Penny doesn't notice her weight gain. Maybe her mother was just too caring for her daughter.

"How does the food taste honey?" Trudy asked.

"Are you kidding, it's delicious!" Penny answered.

She gulfed down the food like a hungry animal and couldn't help herself.

After that Penny was done with all the food from the table she was......
11112.title: Penny gets chubbier after the breakfast

111121.content:
overweight but she still did't noticed how much she gained but she did notice that her clothes felt a bit more tight than normal.

"Mom I think you washed my clothes too hot they're a bit tight."

"Oh I'm sorry sweet hart. I've been very busy lately. I must have washed it too hot. I'm sorry."

"Well it's not that bad. Besides Dijonay also has a chubby belly that's mostly a bit visible."

"Don't you want anymore food honey?" Trudy asked.

"No really mom. I'm full. One more bite and I will explode. I'm serious." Penny said and ran outside.

Penny was walking down the street. She decided too go over to Dijonay. It was always very busy around her house with all her little brothers and sisters. Penny had just one little sister and brother and that was already more then enough for her. Dijonay was her best friend but sometimes she wondered why. Sure they could get along fine but sometimes Dijonay could really stab you in the back.

"Hello Penny!" Someone suddenly said.

"Oh. Hello LaCienega." Penny said careful since she knew very well she did't liked her, and the only reason they hang out together was because she was a friend from Dijonay and Zoey.

"Wow what did you do to yourself? Did you swallow a whale? You're fat."

"What do you mean. My clothes shrunk a bit because my mom washed them too hot."

"Is that what you keep telling yourself? Thinking if you say it enough times it will come true?"

"You know what LaChienega, I don't know what I ever did to you too deserve this. You always picking on me and I don't no why and now you're telling me I'm fat, while I'm not."

"All right listen up proud, lets be fair. I don't like you and you don't like me that's just how it is but you are fat. That's the real truth. If you don't believe me, ask you friends. See you later proud."

"Bye. LaCienega." Said Penny.

She cursed the day that LaCienega's family came living next to them. And for some strange reason her parents liked the parents of LaCienega. Also sugamama liked the grandfather. However she was't really sure if he liked her too. She could never understand a word he said. But he always ended what he said with a really irritating laugh.

"Welcome too my life." Penny said too herself.

She finally reached Dijonay's house and rang the doorbell.
111121.title: Mean LaCienega

choices: A princess dress that fit Penny's size
A T-shirt and pants that fits Penny's size
1111212.content:
But for some reason, Dijonay wasn't home.

"Heh, that's weird. "She isn't home." Penny said to herself.

While Penny was walking on her way home she couldn't help thinking about what Dijonay said about Penny being fat. But fortunately Penny still think that it's nonsense.

So Penny was already home but then she started to get hungry.

"Whoops! "Here we go again. "A hungry stomach."

Penny went to the kitchen. Her mom Trudy was home but she wasn't in the kitchen but Penny looked in the fridge and found a whole chocolate cake and decided to eat it.

"All right." Penny said to herself. "Let's dig in."

So she started to eat the cake and continued to get fatter and once again, not noticing it. Now she got an double chin and her belly and butt was bigger.

But suddenly after she was done with the cake, her clothes started to get too tight.

"O_O, I think i need new bigger clothes." I better ask mom about new clothes."

So Penny went to the living room and saw her mom sitting on the sofa. And she asked: "Mom, do you have bigger clothes for me?" My old ones is starting to get tight."
Trudy said "Of course i got new clothes for you honey" I'll show you." So Trudy and Penny went upstairs to get some clothes for Penny to wear. But which clothes did Penny wear?
1111212.title: Dijonay isn't home

choices: Penny asks her dad if she's getting fat
11112121.content:
"Look I got this one for you. Is't it lovely?" Trudy asked while she hold up a princess dress.

Penn looked a bit doubtful. Looking at it she thought it would be a bit to wide for her but that was not the only thing that was bothering her. It was a princess dress. She stopped dressing like a princess about eight years ago. What did her mother thought she was? A toddler?

"Eh mom... No advance but I think it's a bit to big for me." Penny said not wanting to hurt her mother's feelings by telling her she did't want to dress like a princess.

"How do you know it's to big for you if you did't even tried it one?" Trudy said calmly.

Penny sighed. Well there was no one here who could see her besides her family and you need to try on clothes to make sure the did or did not fit. Penny pulled on the princess dress and too her surprise it fitted her perfectly. It felt a lot easier then her old tight clothes.

"And? How is it?"

"It fits perfectly mom. How is that possible? I was sure it was to big for me."

"Well you're still a growing girl honey." Trudy said proudly.

"I guess that's true. LaCienega said I was getting fat. That's not true. Is it mom?"

"Eh no of course not. You're not getting fat. You're just getting taller. Some people mix up those two. I'm sure LaCienega did't mend it that way."

Oh yes she did. Penny thought to herself but she did't say it. For some reason Her mother did't seem to notice how mean LaCienega was. Maybe because LaCienega's mother was her best friend. Penny sighed and went downstairs.
When she came down she noticed her father, Suga Mama, Bebe and Cece came home.

"A there's Penny. How is my granddaughter?"

"I'm fine Suga Mama. Thank you."

Penny went sitting next to her dad an the couch while Bebe and Cece were pulling at her dress wondering if it really was their sister wearing this.
11112121.title: A princess dress

choices: They were curious about how she became what she is now
They started to laugh at her but Penny surprisingly started to laugh too
111121211.content:
"Dinner time!" Trudy called the family since the dinner was done.

The whole family incuding Penny sat down and started to eat. There were bacon and hot dogs on the table. And the one that eats the most of the food is once again, Penny. Now she was bigger than she was. However, her dress wasn't getting tighter. No one in her family knew that Penny was getting bigger except her mom Trudy which seems to know that her plan was working, but it wasn't a mean or an evil plan, it was a plan to make her daugther happy.

After the dinner Penny was full and was now really tired and wanted to go to sleep in her bed for a good day tomorrow.

"Uuughh, I'm so tired." Penny yawned. "I think i better sleep now."

Fast forward to next morning on Friday, Penny was on her way to school. While she was in school there were some students (plus her best friends) that noticed something different about Penny. They noticed that she was much fatter and that she wore a princess dress.

"Hi guys" Penny said to her friends.

How does her friends react when they see Penny?
111121211.title: Dinner time

1111212111.content:
"Did you dress yourself in the dark or something?" Dijonay asked surprised looking at her dress.

"What do you mean?" Penny asked.

"Well that princess dress you wear is't the latest fashion. Except maybe in kindergarten." Sticky calmly said.

"What happened to you Penny?" Zoey asked. "It seemed like you did gain a lot."

"But lost you sense for fashion, not that you had much to begin with." LaCienega said while she was busy file her nails.

"What are you all talking about. All right I admit that the dress is't maybe the best outfit but it's not that bad. Besides Zoey what do you mean whit gain a lot? I did't gain weight."

"Eh friend you did gain weight. Did't you looked in the mirror lately?" Dijonay asked pulling up one eyebrow.

"Listen I can understand it from LaCienega but you guys. You suppose to be my friends!" Penny screamed almost in tears.

"Penny we are you friends." Sticky said calmly like always. "That's why we're telling you the truth. You really did gain. If you can't trust us you friends who can you trust?"

Penny angry leaned against the wall with her arms over each other. She did't want to believe her friends but at the other hand Sticky and Zoey normally did't lie against her. Dijonay maybe if she had any advantage in it but that was't the case this time. Her face slowly got a sad expression while she looked at her friends.

"Did I really gain a bit of weight?" She asked careful.

"Girl you did gain and not just a bit." Dijonay said. "A bit extra weight can look good. Just look at me, but at the other hand I look terrific at any size but in your case that extra weight is't really doing it."

Penny slowly looked at her friends.
1111212111.title: They were curious about how she became what she...

choices: She looked at herself in the mirror and surprisingly liked her new self
She looks at herself and realized that Trudy fattened her but not in a bad way
11112121112.content:
Just after her friends are trying to convince her she started to run away in tears.

What did she do next?
11112121112.title: Penny runs away crying

111121211122.content:
When she saw herself in the mirror she saw that she did gain weight. She noticed her double chin and her big and soft belly. She even noticed her big butt and wide thighs. She started to scream.

"AAAHHH!!!!" Penny screamed. "I am so fat!" "How did this happen to me?"

Then she realized that it was Trudy, her mom that made her gain weight.

"Mom!" She said to herself quietly.

But during that Penny thought that her mom was responsible, well, Trudy didn't fatten her just to be mean.

"Wait a minute." My mom didn't fatten me to be mean to me. "I think she wanted me to look nicer."

At first Penny was going to burst in anger to her mom for fattening her up but actually, she kinda likes her weight.

"Well, i don't want to hurt my mom's feelings now." Now what will i do?" Oh, now i know!" I can ask her how did i became like this." I am so curious."

So Penny went home after school only to find her mom at home.

What was Penny's reaction to her mom?
111121211122.title: She looks at herself and realized that Trudy fa...

1111212111221.content:
"Hi mom. How was your day?"

"It was fine. But I still don't know what's wrong with that naked molrat a boy brought in today."

"Someone had a naked molrat... as a pet?" Penny asked surprised.

"Yeah. Kind of strange animal as a pet is't it. Say are you hungry?"

"As a matter of fact I am mom. I would like something to eat." Penny said with a grin.

"Well I have some delicious hot dogs for you." Trudy said while she put a huge plate with hot dogs on the table.

"Mom. Tell me honest. What is exactly in those hot dogs besides the weenies, the bread, the ketchup, the mayonnaise and I don't like mustard so what's in those hot dogs besides that?"

"What... what do you mean?" Trudy asked trying to stay calm, but Penny could easily see her mother felt uncomfortable and was sweating.

"I mean exactly what say." Penny said with a wide grin. "What is in those hot dogs besides the normal stuff. I know something is in it. I gained a lot of weight in just a very short time. So tell me what is it."

"You... you knew something was in it?" Trudy asked.

"No. I found it out recently. So what is it?"

"Well it's some stuff from my work we use for animals who lost their appetite and the other stuff is for animals to gain weight. like for cows and pigs. I gave both things to you to let you gain a bit. I thought you looked better and cuter with some flab on your thin body."

"Well I must admit your right. I do look better. I'm also not mad." Penny said. "I even want to gain some more, but I do need new clothes."

"Well I guess that's fair." Trudy said with a smile.
1111212111221.title: What is in it?

choices: She was a little concerned about the dress but she bought it anyway.
11112121112211.content:
So Penny and Trudy went to a shop to find some girl clothes that should fit Penny's size. Penny asked Trudy where to look for those that can match Penny's grown size.

"Where are gonna look for some clothes that should fit me now that i am big?" Penny said.

"That's just easy, honey. "We should just find the one that matches your perfect size." Trudy said.

"All right, then. Let's start looking!"

Both Penny and Trudy started to find some clothes that wouldn't be tight for Penny.

While Trudy was searching for some clothes for Penny to wear, she found a normal princess dress that was purple and matched Penny's size perfectly.

"Uh, Penny! I found something for you." Trudy called.

"What is it mom?" Penny asked.

"I got this perfect dress for you." Wanna try it out, honey?"

"Sure, mom."

So Penny was putting on the princess dress. And actually, it fits her perfectly. What did she think about the dress?
11112121112211.title: Clothes shopping

111121211122111.content:
She looked at herself in the mirror. She looked like such a princess in those kid cartoon shows. She stopped dressing like a princess ages ago and was't planning to start again. She also remembered what her friends said. At the other hand it fitted her perfectly and she was't sure or the clothes she normally wore would.

"Well I guess I don't have much choice."

Penny walked out of the dressing room while holding the princess dress.

"Al right mom. Those fitted fine." Penny said while she handed her mother the dress.

While Trudy paid for the dress Penny thought about her gain. Sure when she first found out she gained she was a bit upset bit to be honest after looking better at herself she must admit that the extra weight looked good at her. Very good. Maybe she should try to gain even a bit more.

"All right Penny I'm done." Trudy said waking Penny from her thoughts.

Penny followed her mother outside and too the car.

"Mom you fattened me up because you thought I looked more cute and nice with some fat on my body."

"That's right honey, and listen I'm sorry. I should't have done it. I just tricked you but I should't have don that to you."

"It's all right mom. I'm happy you did it. I really do look better."

"True but I feel like I should have told you what I did. I just wanted to help you but I should't have done it behind your back and just tell you what I wanted to do."

"Well if you had done that I don't think I would have agreed with you, and think you were kind of crazy. By the way how fat did you want me to get?"

"Oh... I don't know. I did't think about that. But I guess now you found out what I did It's up to you. Do you want to gain more weight?"

"Yeah I want to gain more weight... I'm just not sure how much more."

"Tell you what, I just keep giving you the stuff, and when you think you're fat enough tell me and I will stop. I promise you I will stop."

"Okay mom. That's a promise." Penny said with a grin.

"I just hope your hungry. I have some more food for you at home."
111121211122111.title: I should't have done that to you

1112.content:
It was a rainy day and Penny was bored and depressed. She had nothing fun to do at home. Every other kids was inside their home as well because of the bad weather.

"Yeah, a really boring day indeed, nothing fun to do and no one to meet outside." Penny said.

Suddenly after some minutes her belly growled of obvious hunger. Now Penny was really hungry and wanted to eat.

"Uurrgghh" Penny moaned. "I'm really hungry. "I better find something good to eat."

So Penny went downstairs to the kitchen to find something delicious to eat. She checks the fridge and found some waffles and started to eat. While she was eating her belly and butt started to become softer grow a little. Her chin became softer but hasn't developed a double chin yet. A half hour after the waffles her belly rumbled again for some reason meaning that Penny is still hungry.

"What?!" I'm still hungry again?!" But i have already ate some waffles."

The belly still rumbled of hunger. Penny gave up

"Aaww!" Fine."

So she checked the fridge again to find another meal to eat.
What did she find in the fridge?
1112.title: She get depressed

Penny fattens her up after being insulted

132.content:
It all began one day at the Proud Snack factory.

Oscar Proud. and his best friend Felix Boulevardez were ready to test an all new Proud Snack.

Oscar went up, ready to test it first.

He picked up the first snack, and ate it whole.

what happened?
132.title: Oscar Proud

choices: Oscar's belly begins to swell up
Oscar notices a blue spot on his nose
1323.content:
Oscar & Felix waited.

and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited. and waited.

but nothing happened.

"Hm. Nothing." Oscar said.
1323.title: Nothing happens... yet.

choices: Oscar's belly begins to swell up even more
13231.content:
Oscar's stomach made a strange gurgle. Then, it slowly started to swell, with his bellybutton poking out.

"Whoa!" Felix said.

Oscar's belly began to swell up like a balloon.

his stomach made another strange gurgle

"I seem to have gained a few pounds." Oscar said, seeing his swollen belly.

what happened next?!
13231.title: Oscar's belly begins to swell up

13232.content:
Suddenly, Oscar saw a small blue spot appear on his nose.

Within seconds, his nose had turned bright blue.

what happened next?

tell me

132321.content:
And upon removing his shoes and socks, Oscar saw blueness appearing on the ends of his toes which then spread down his feet.

the blueness went past his abdomen.

then spread down his arms and up to his face.

his face started turning blue.

even his teeth, eyes and hair turned blue too.

Oscar was horrified. "Wh-wh-what's... what's happening to me?!" he said.

also, his clothes turned blue too.

Oscar Proud was now blue from head to toe!

134.content:
Sunset lounged in her home, "Ah. A week all to myself, how nice." She was content, Felix and LaCienega had won a Wizard Kelly luxury cruise thanks to Felix's cuh-razy hijinks. To fully take advantage of this situation, she decided to take a week of from the force.

"Hmm. Since no one else is around, I've got the freedom to be myself. That means...PIGOUT TIME!" Sunset bolted into the kitchen and rummaged through the fridge. On the table, she placed a whole peanut butter cake, chocolate smothered eclairs, and 2 gallons of whole milk to wash it all down, "Thank you, Wizard Kelly."

Sunset snatched a whole slice of cake with her bare hand and nibbled little-by-little until she shoved the whole thing into her mouth, "Mmph - so moist, so rich, so tasty, sweet, and....buttery-mmmhmm." Sunset gnawed an eclair and steadily accelerated her eating speed. The milk slowly vanished as she ate. Her clothes began to feel snug as the number of slices of cake an eclairs went down, until.....
134.title: Sunset Boulevardez

141.content: Who exactly in her family?
141.title: Penny Proud and her family

info.brief_description: a weight gain on the characters from The Proud Family Cartoon
info.description:
1. try to write a chapter longer than a paragraph
2. no sex or private bits
3. they can get as fat as you want
4. keep in touch with the show
5. if you like vore, I have no problem with that
6. have fun and I will make my own stories too!

when it saids "focus on the girls", than the girls are only the ones to gain weight.
when it saids "focus on the boys", than the boys are only the ones to gain weight.

when I say the girls and boys, I am talking about the kids.

when it saids "focus on the Adults", than the Adults are only the ones to gain weight.
when it saids "focus on the Kids and Adults", than the Kids and Adults are only the ones to gain weight.

the section called " focus on other kind of expanisons" is the section were other kind of expansion are allowed. have no idea what they are at the moment. once people add, I can be able to say.

the stories that I will be writing are off limits. however there are choices were you do not have to follow the story.

as for now, this is mainly weight gain and vore story, but things could change.

Lastly, I ask you kindly to email me if you want me to keep on making these stories. However, would like some feedback from the many people who watch this here. thank you and have a nice time here!

for now, there will be no actively for a while, keep that in mind.
